alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 2:57PM PST until February 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 AM to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally higher amounts up to 12 inches possible along the peaks and volcanos.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
